events.message: I recently ordered a jacket from your site but it doesn't fit at all and I want to request a refund.
The case has been identified as a refund request due to customer's dissatisfaction with the product size.
Your case has been assigned to a customer service agent who will assist you with the refund process.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out. I'm here to help you with the refund for your jacket order.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original packaging?
My order number is 123456789. Yes, the jacket is unused and still has the tags on in the original packaging.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund as soon as we receive the return package. I will send you a prepaid return label.
Thanks for the quick response and sending the return label. I appreciate the assistance.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund. The amount should appear on your statement within 5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and to see if there is anything else I can assist you with.
Since the refund was completed and there are no further questions, I am now closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
